pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Medicinal Oil Stress Relief Oil 25ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Stress Relief with Sweet Orange, Mandarin, Lavender, Bergamot & Cedarwood essential oils that have been traditionally used in aromatherapy to assist in the management of stress.

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.
Application to skin may cause sensitivity to sunlight.
Keep out of reach of children.
Not to be taken.
Not to be used neat.
Store below 30C.
Do not use if seal is around lid is damaged.

Common Uses

The calming effects of Sweet Orange, Mandarin, Lavender, Bergamot and Cedarwood essential oils have been traditionally used in aromatherapy as natural sedatives during times of stress to help relieve nervous tension, sleeplessness, headaches, neuralgia, fatigue and mild anxiety, providing a sense of calm and comfort.

Ingredients

Each mL of PURE ESSENTIAL OIL contains essential oils from:
Citrus sinensis (Sweet Orange) Fruit peel 450 µL, Citrus reticulata
(Mandarin) Fruit peel 200 µL, , Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) Herb top
flowering 150 µL, Citrus aurantium (Bergamot) Fruit peel 150 µL,
Juniperus virginiana (Virginian Cedarwood) Wood 50 µL.

Directions

How to Use (Adults and children 2 years and over, use as required or up to 6 times a day):
Vaporisation: Add 3-6 drops (0.2mL) to the water in your vaporiser.
Massage: Add 5 drops (0.2mL) to 10mL carrier oil and massage into chest and back. The mixture can be kept for 24 hours at room temperature.
